summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.8 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9679 lux) and cloud levels (up 329 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15082 lux), cloud levels (up 1908 m), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and outside temperature (up 2.2°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and winds will be practically absent. Rain showers likely, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dim outside. Changeable conditions.
